patterns.name: Blank Slate Paralysis
patterns.description: Inability to initiate action or thought without a concrete anchor or starting point.
patterns.trigger: Unstructured environments, empty pages, open-ended prompts.
patterns.mechanism: Lack of 'entry point' leads to infinite degrees of freedom and decision paralysis.

patterns.name: Ephemeral Fragment Loss
patterns.description: Brilliant but fleeting insights are lost because the friction to capture and structure them is too high.
patterns.mechanism: Gap between nonlinear thought speed and linear capture tools.

patterns.name: Context Collapse
patterns.description: Losing the 'thread' or emotional resonance of an idea when moving from capture to processing.
patterns.trigger: Time delay between idea generation and organization.

patterns.name: Structural Resistance
patterns.description: Rejection of rigid, top-down organizational systems that feel like 'chores'.
patterns.mechanism: Mismatched cognitive style (Exploration must precede Structure).

loops: Idea Generation -> Lack of Structure -> Overwhelm -> Abandonment
Need to Start -> No Entry Point -> Paralysis -> Frustration -> Dopamine Drop -> Harder to Start
